https://tmrev.io/movie/413784-Blue Velvet Revisited 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zt5V9XBzo514gbQvbx2jZ2YOdlM.jpg When David Lynch was making his film Blue Velvet, German filmmaker Peter Braatz was also on set, shooting documentary footage with a Super 8 film camera. Now, on Blue Velvet's 30th anniversary, Braatz presents his footage, along with still photographs, as a "meditation" on Lynch's work. Blue Velvet Revisited
